Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Noosa Heads (Noosa), Noosa Springs Golf Resort & Spa is convenient to Sunshine Beach Village Shops and Ed Webb Park. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Noosa National Park and Noosa Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 25 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. LCD televisions and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as outdoor tennis courts and an outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle that operates within 3 km.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Noosa Springs Golf Resort & Spa. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Noosa Springs Golf Resort & Spa. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Noosa Heads (Noosa), Noosa Springs Golf Resort & Spa is convenient to Sunshine Beach Village Shops and Ed Webb Park. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Noosa National Park and Noosa Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sunshine Beach Village Shops - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Ed Webb Park - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Noosa National Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Noosa Beach - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
Noosa Marina - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Coolum Beach - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi
Eumundi Market - 14.9 km / 9.3 mi
Mt Coolum Golf Club - 16.8 km / 10.5 mi
Cooroy Golf Club - 17.5 km / 10.8 mi
Ginger Factory - 19.8 km / 12.3 mi
Twin Waters Golf Club - 23.7 km / 14.7 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 26.5 km / 16.4 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 29.6 km / 18.4 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 29.9 km / 18.6 mi
Big Pineapple - 30 km / 18.7 mi

The preferred airport for Noosa Springs Golf Resort & Spa is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 21 km / 13 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
